description: Number of chordal labeled graphs (connected or not) with n nodes.
references: N. C. Wormald, Counting labeled chordal graphs. Graphs Combin. 1 (1985), no. 2, 193-200.
formula: From the relation G(x)=exp(g(x)) between generating functions for connected g(x) and all G(x) labeled structures and considering generating functions for chordal graphs (c_n, A007134), we have a_n = c_n + \frac{1}{n} Sum_{k=1}^{n-1} k {n choose k} c_k a_{n-k}
author: Robert Castelo (rcastelo(AT)imim.es), Jan 06 2001
